product_name: Canari Gel Bike Shorts Liner - Men's
long_description: Ideal for the weekend warrior, these gel liners turn any pair of shorts into cycling shorts. Made of a polyester and spandex blend for ultimate softness, breathability and stretch. Gel pad system dissipates shock by forming a fluid barrier between the hard saddle shell and the rider's anatomy, and it reduces skin irritation. Soft, antimicrobial chamois offers chafe-free comfort on long rides. Elastic leg grippers keep shorts in place. Machine wash cold, tumble dry low; do not use bleach or softeners.
short_description: Ideal for the weekend warrior, these gel liners turn any pair of shorts into cycling shorts.
